thread.section_title: The Standard, East Village - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent!
thread.title_full: Excellent! - Review of The Standard, East Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CountessChloe
title: Excellent!
text: We stayed on the 16th floor in a corner unit and the views were awesome. The room was very clean, the bed was super comfortable, the staff were so helpful and friendly, and the price was very reasonable. We valet parked our car because it was much easier than trying to find a garage somewhere. There are many restaurants and bars within a short walk. I will absolutely stay here again! Highly recommend.
